content: Siemens is positioning Industrial AI as the force that will reshape the next century, akin to how electricity revolutionized the world.

Siemens and NVIDIA are expanding their partnership to build an "Industrial AI Operating System" that integrates AI-native engineering and "active intelligence" to close the gap between ideas and reality.
Digital Twin Composer is a new tool, available mid-2026, designed to power the industrial metaverse at scale.
@PepsiCo is using Siemens Digital Twin Composer to simulate and upgrade facilities, achieving 90% issue detection before physical implementation.
Siemens and @Microsoft are bridging IT and OT by launching 9 new Industrial Copilots to streamline manufacturing and operations.
@CommonwealthFusionSystems is leveraging Siemens technology to accelerate the path to commercial clean fusion energy.
Siemens is integrating with @meta Ray-Ban AI Glasses for shop floor efficiency and Dotmatics for accelerating drug discovery.
